name: IBM HTTP Server V9 Liberty ready on a single VM - IBM
description: This template will create a IBM HTTP Server V9.0.0.x on a single VM, ready for use with WebSphere Liberty Server

metadata.displayName: IBM HTTP Server V9 Liberty ready on a single VM
metadata.longDescription: This template will create a IBM HTTP Server V9.0.0.x on a single VM, ready for use with WebSphere Liberty Server

bullets.title: Operating Systems Supported
bullets.description:
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6
Ubuntu 16.04

bullets.title: Topology
bullets.description:
1 virtual machine:
IBM HTTP Server instance

bullets.title: Software Deployed
bullets.description:
IBM HTTP Server for WebSphere Application Server V9
IBM SDK, Java Technology Edition V8

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. The user is responsible for obtaining appropriate software licenses and downloads prior to template deployment.
2. Detailed system requirements for IBM HTTP Server 9 - https://www.ibm.com/software/reports/compatibility/clarity/index.html
3. IBM Knowledge Center for IBM HTTP Server 9 - https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/en/SSEQTJ_9.0.0
4. IBM Support Portal - https://www.ibm.com/support/home/
